#labels Releasing
=Release Process=

*This needs updating for googlecode *


 * Make sure you followed: [Maven Build & Publising Notes|Maven Build & Publising]
 * Change version #s
 * Deploy to wicketwebbeans repository
 * Tag with Maven version #
 * Update web site (see Maven notes)
 * Create release notes
 * Wait for Maven central repository replication

 * mvn clean ; zip full source tree: zip -r /tmp/wicketwebbeans-fullsrc-1.0-rc2.zip .

 * Upload bin/src/javadoc to SF.net
 * Change pom version #'s to next version + SNAPSHOT, build and deploy new snapshot as described in [Maven Build & Publising Notes|Maven Build & Publising]
 * Announce to mailing lists, <[mailto:wicketwebbeans-users@lists.sourceforge.net|wicketwebbeans-users@lists.sourceforge.net]>, <[mailto:users@wicket.apache.org|users@wicket.apache.org]>.
 * Announce to SF news, Freshmeat
 * Take a break
